title: Roon
description: Roon, a brand known for its innovative music streaming solutions, utilizes a sophisticated color palette in its visual identity. The primary colors include stark whites (#FFFFFF) and blacks (#000000), coupled with a striking blue (#1E6FFF) that adds dynamism and depth. The softer hues of #DCE3EB and #878EA0 provide balance and elegance. These colors are derived from the official Roon website and the Behance showcase, reflecting both modernity and a high-end audio experience.
